sentence: Earlier today, Georgians gathered to oppose Brian Kemp's dangerous "criminal carry" law.
author: Darryl Coote
title: Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp signs law to allow conceal carry without a permit

sentence: Georgia governor Brian Kemp signed a few education bills into law, including one that targets divisive concepts? in the classroom, as reported by CNN.
author: Murjani Rawls
title: Republican Gov. Brian Kemp Signs Bill Limiting Race Discussions In Classrooms
